code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import Home from"./components/Home";import About from"./components/About";import Projects from"./components/Projects";import Contact from"./components/Contact";import Navbar from'./components/Header';import GrainOverlay from'./components/GrainOverlay';import background from'./assets/imgs/background.mp4';import'./assets/styles/App.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const App=()=>{const[currentPage,setCurrentPage]=useState('home');const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);const[showWelcome,setShowWelcome]=useState(true);useEffect(()=>{const videoElement=document.querySelector('video');if(videoElement){videoElement.onloadeddata=()=>{setLoading(false);setShowWelcome(true);};const handleVideoPlay=()=>{if(videoElement.paused){videoElement.play();}};document.addEventListener('touchstart',handleVideoPlay);return()=>{document.removeEventListener('touchstart',handleVideoPlay);};}},[]);const renderPage=()=>{switch(currentPage){case'home':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Home,{loading:loading,showWelcome:showWelcome});case'about':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(About,{});case'projects':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Projects,{});case'contact':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Contact,{});}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(GrainOverlay,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navbar,{setCurrentPage:setCurrentPage}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"home ".concat(loading?'loading':'loaded'),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("video",{className:"videoTag",autoPlay:true,loop:true,muted:true,playsInline:true,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("source",{src:background,type:"video/mp4"})}),renderPage()]})]});};export default App;
